topic: Daylight Analysis - This simulation didn't work to twist geometries?

replies.body:
Camila,
Your window openings are not solved. If you see the attached image you can see that the walls are still full after you "inserted" the window geometry.
I'm not sure the HB_addHBGlz component can deal with twisted geometries or you need to try a different approach to solve the issue (maybe surface by surface). -A.

Thank you for you reply.
